page.title: 06THE ARTS, NAILSWORTH
page.content: There are several local artists beginning to find fame.{Fiona Owen}is one of them.She paints very intricate pictures whilst her husband{John} paints landscapes.{Nigel Ashcroft}is also a painter who takes photographs of objects and later paints a picture of them. {Days Mill}has continual exhibitions displaying paintings by local Gloucestershire artists and also sells different Cotswold crafts.In Cossack Square there is another small art gallery which nowadays has an annual exhibition of the famous{Helen {William's}work.There is also an art gallery which displays Victorian watercolours and paintings. In{Box and {Amberley}there are meetings of groups of people who get together to paint.
